entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
